Sean Ormiston

Full-Stack Engineer ⎈ Musician

About Me

A few words of introduction...

Hi, my name is Sean Ormiston.

I value software that empowers problem solvers and entices lateral thinkers. I enjoy interfaces that are harmonious with the clarity of their design and coherent with the logic of their use.

As a newly graduated classical musician in 2012, I relocated to Brazil for 4 years of performance work, learning the language as I went. When I returned to the US, I transitioned to work as a logistics and contracting coordinator for international performing artists. As an information worker who had to anticipate client needs and manage information to extreme precision, I began writing my first Python scripts to create efficiencies and elimintate human error during repetitive tasks.

I also enjoy reading science fiction and history, watching great films, kettlebell training, and keeping up chops on my beloved instrument - the double bass.

As a continuing learner, I strive to write code that is lean and scalable, with a fair dollop of earnestness and delight. I am a proud self-starter eager to grow as a full-stack developer. Check out the rest of my site to see some of my projects!
